meanings.definition: A tropical tree of the magnolia family, known for its fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The champaca tree in the garden smells lovely.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy the sweet scent of champaca flowers.
meanings.sent3: The champaca tree decided to wear perfume to smell even better.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the champaca flowers, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The champaca blooms painted the air with their delightful fragrance.

meanings.definition: The fragrant flowers of the champaca tree.
meanings.sent1: I picked a champaca to put in a vase.
meanings.sent2: The champaca blossoms are used in perfumes.
meanings.sent3: The champaca flowers giggled when tickled by the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a champaca blossom.
meanings.sent5: The champaca petals danced gracefully in the wind.
